mapper.select: SELECT mb.MEALKIT_NAME,mb.MEALKIT_IMAGE ,mb.MEALKIT_PRICE ,cd.CART_DETAIL_QUANTITY,cd.IS_CHECKED FROM CART_DETAIL cd, MEALKIT_BOARD mb, CART c, "MEMBER" m WHERE cd.CART_NO = c.CART_NO AND cd.MEALKIT_NO = mb.MEALKIT_NO AND c.CART_ORDER_STATUS = 'N' AND m.MEMBER_EMAIL = #{memberEmail} AND cd.IS_ORDERED_DATAIL = 'N'
mapper.update: UPDATE CART_DETAIL SET CART_DETAIL_QUANTITY = #{cartDetailQuantity} WHERE MEALKIT_NO = #{mealkiitNo} AND CART_NO = #{cartNo} AND IS_ORDERED_DATAIL = 'N'
mapper.select: SELECT c.cart_no FROM CART c WHERE c.CART_ORDER_STATUS = 'N' AND c.MEMBER_EMAIL = #{memberEmail}
SELECT c.CART_NO, c.CART_ORDER_STATUS, c.CART_TOTAL FROM CART C,"MEMBER" m WHERE m.MEMBER_EMAIL = #{memberEmail} AND C.CART_ORDER_STATUS = 'N'

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CART_DETAIL cd , CART c , "MEMBER" m WHERE c.CART_NO = cd.CART_NO AND m.MEMBER_EMAIL = c.MEMBER_EMAIL AND c.CART_ORDER_STATUS = 'N' AND cd.IS_ORDERED_DATAIL = 'N' AND cd.MEALKIT_NO = #{mealkitNo} AND m.MEMBER_EMAIL = #{memberEmail}
mapper.update: UPDATE CART_DETAIL SET CART_DETAIL_QUANTITY = CART_DETAIL_QUANTITY + #{cartDetailQuantity} WHERE CART_NO = #{cartNo} AND MEALKIT_NO = #{mealkitNo}
mapper.select: SELECT c.CART_NO, c.CART_ORDER_STATUS, c.CART_TOTAL FROM CART C,"MEMBER" m WHERE m.MEMBER_EMAIL = #{memberEmail} AND C.CART_ORDER_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT mb.MEALKIT_NO,mb.MEALKIT_INVENTORY,cd.CART_DETAIL_QUANTITY FROM MEALKIT_BOARD mb, CART_DETAIL cd WHERE cd.MEALKIT_NO = mb.MEALKIT_NO AND cd.CART_NO = #{cartNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE CART_DETAIL SET IS_CHECKED = #{chkinfo} WHERE MEALKIT_NO = #{mealkitNo}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM CART_DETAIL WHERE MEALKIT_NO = #{mealkitNo} AND CART_NO = #{cartNo}
mapper.select: SELECT mb.MEALKIT_NO , mb.MEALKIT_NAME, SUM(cd.CART_DETAIL_QUANTITY ) AS CART_DETAIL_QUANTITY , SUM(cd.CART_DETAIL_QUANTITY ) * mb.MEALKIT_PRICE AS mealkitTotalPrice FROM MEALKIT_BOARD mb ,CART_DETAIL cd WHERE mb.MEALKIT_NO = cd.MEALKIT_NO AND cd.IS_ORDERED_DATAIL = 'Y' GROUP BY mb.MEALKIT_NO,mb.MEALKIT_NAME ,mb.MEALKIT_PRICE ORDER BY mealkitTotalPrice desc

SELECT RB.RECIPE_BOARD_TITLE,RB.MEMBER_EMAIL,COUNT(LR.RECIPE_BOARD_ID) RECIPE_LIKE_COUNT FROM RECIPE_BOARD rb , LIKE_RKH lr WHERE RB.RECIPE_BOARD_ID = LR.RECIPE_BOARD_ID GROUP BY RB.RECIPE_BOARD_TITLE, RB.MEMBER_EMAIL ORDER BY RECIPE_LIKE_COUNT DESC
SELECT mb2.MEALKIT_NAME ,COUNT(mb2.MEALKIT_NO) mealkitCount FROM MEALKIT_BOOKMARK mb , MEALKIT_BOARD mb2 WHERE mb.MEALKIT_NO = mb2.MEALKIT_NO GROUP BY mb2.MEALKIT_NAME order BY mealkitCount
